description: Please check our realtime travel news for the latest updates.Metropolitan lineA full Metropolitan line service to Aldgate will re-commence from Monday morning, 25 July.Northern lineFollowing the incident at Stockwell on Friday, services have been restored

texts: Following incidents on the Tube on Thursday 21 and Friday 22 July, and because of the continuing disruption caused by the events of 7 July, some Tube services remain disrupted.
Please check our realtime travel news for the latest updates.
Metropolitan line
A full Metropolitan line service to Aldgate will re-commence from Monday morning, 25 July.
Northern line
Following the incident at Stockwell on Friday, services have been restored to all destinations.
Piccadilly line
Due to the events of 7 July there remains no service between Arnos Grove and Hyde Park Corner or between Rayners Lane and Uxbridge.
Rail Replacement bus services are running as follows:

Service A: Arnos Grove - Finchley Central (Fast) for Northern line services. Service B: Arnos Grove - Bounds Green - Wood Green - Turnpike Lane - Seven Sisters for Victoria line and National Rail services.
Circle line
No service due to the events of 7 July
Hammersmith & City line

Following the incident on Thursday at Shepherd's Bush station, services have now been restored between Hammersmith and Paddington. There remains no service between Paddington and Barking due to the events of 7 July.
District line
No service between Edgware Road and High Street Kensington due to the events of 7 July.font
Other travel information
Please click here for details of disruption due to planned engineering work and for the very latest on how services are running.
For alternative route options you can use Journey Planner
Please keep your belongings with you at all times. Passengers are asked to remain vigilant and to report anything suspicious to a member of staff or a Police Officer.
